projects.title: My pet project - F5 Remont
projects.description: It is a CRM system for managing the mobile technique repair process. For the UI React was used as a central library with redux as the state manager. For the server side express.js was picked as a quick and simple solution, Prisma.js as the ORM system, and socket io for creating a special websocket API to provide the possibility of making a microservice architecture. As the testing library here I used Jest and for e2e testing, I used Cypress

bot.title: Telegram bot
bot.description: Using websocket API was implemented telegram bot for notification functionality.
